code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faFileUpload,faHome,faProjectDiagram,faQuestion,faUser,faUserCog}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import Auth from"../contexts/Auth";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Nav(){var _useContext=useContext(Auth),isAuthenticated=_useContext.isAuthenticated;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"icon",icon:faHome})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/quiz",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"icon",icon:faQuestion})})}),!isAuthenticated&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"icon",icon:faUser})})})})||/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/manageTree",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"icon",icon:faProjectDiagram})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/manageUsers",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"icon",icon:faUserCog})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/fileUpload",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"icon",icon:faFileUpload})})})]})]})})});}export default Nav;
